settings.title: Honored To Be A Certified B Corp.
Good For People and The Planet
settings.copy: Caldera + Lab was founded with one pioneering goal: to build a results-driven men’s skincare brand that was uncompromising in its commitment to social and environmental wellbeing. As a result, we are now one of only 70 US-based personal care companies to receive the prestigious B Corp certification.

settings.heading: The Gold Standard For Conscious Businesses
settings.text: B Corporations open their doors to be assessed and monitored by the nonprofit B Lab, to verify that their business practices positively impact employees, communities, and the planet. Caldera + Lab was graded on everything from supply chain operations and input materials, to charitable giving and employee benefits. Even our choice to use the only biodegradable adhesive in existence on our packaging.

settings.heading: Accountability Isn’t Always Easy. But It’s Right.
settings.text: The B Corp designation doesn’t just prove where Caldera currently excels. It also legally binds us to future social and environmental performance standards. Year after year. We’re in this for the long haul, and we wouldn’t have it any other way.

settings.heading: Legally Binding 2% Donation
settings.copy: Our company bylaws state that we’re committed to donating 2% of annual revenue to vetted nonprofits. Not “if we had a good quarter.” No matter what. Every single year.

settings.heading: Discerning Partnerships
settings.copy: We choose suppliers with their own sustainability initiatives like waste management and carbon offsets, to support our aim of leaving the lightest possible footprint.

settings.heading: Reduce and Reuse
settings.copy: The Good’s packaging is 95% recyclable, and we keep innovating to leverage as much biodegradable, recycled, and recyclable material as possible.

settings.heading: selective hand-harvesting
settings.copy: We wild-harvest our botanicals by hand from the Teton Mountain Range every summer, and follow sustainable harvesting best practices to ensure we don’t measurably deplete the source.

settings.title: We Went The Extra Mile. And Then Went Further.
Business Should Be A Force For Good.
settings.subheading: B Corps invest in people, communities, and the planet.
settings.copy:
We believe that business has a purpose beyond creating profit. That’s why we embrace the additional costs and effort required to keep The Good, our packaging, and entire production process, 100% free of all toxic and synthetic ingredients. Caldera + Lab is honored to meet B Corp’s impeccable standards. Now and always.

You can see our detailed score breakdown on B Corp’s website.
